{{Campaignbox Syrian uprising}}
{{Campaignbox Syrian uprising}}
â
The '''Siege of Hama''', also known as the '''Ramadan Massacre''', occurred on July 31, 2011, primarily in the [[Syrian]] city of [[Hama]]. The Syrian government sent in the Syrian army to eradicate ongoing dissent on the eve of [[Ramadan]]. Live ammunition was indiscriminately fired on the civilian population, along with tank and artillery fire.<ref>[http://english.aljazeera.net/news/middleeast/2011/07/201173143432348733.html 'Scores dead' as Syrian tanks storm Hama city - Middle East - Al Jazeera English<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> At least 142 people have died, with over 100 in Hama alone, and 19 in [[Deir ez-Zor]]. Hundreds more have been wounded. The crackdown has been the most intense of the [[2011 Syrian uprising]] so far, with already over 2200 protesters deaths since March 15.<ref>[http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/43295395/ns/world_news-mideast_n_africa/t/syria-says-forces-killed-northern-massacre/ Syria says 120 forces killed in 'massacre' - World news - Mideast/N. Africa - msnbc.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.dawn.com/2011/07/31/syrian-army-kills-at-least-95-in-hama-activist.html Syrian army kills at least 95 in Hama: activist | World | DAWN.COM<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
+
The '''Siege of Hama''', also known as the '''Ramadan Massacre''', occurred on July 31, 2011, primarily in the [[Syrian]] city of [[Hama]]. The Syrian government sent in the Syrian army to eradicate ongoing dissent on the eve of [[Ramadan]]. Live ammunition was indiscriminately fired on the civilian population, along with tank and artillery fire.<ref>[http://english.aljazeera.net/news/middleeast/2011/07/201173143432348733.html 'Scores dead' as Syrian tanks storm Hama city - Middle East - Al Jazeera English<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> At least 142 people have died, with over 100 in Hama alone, and 19 in [[Deir ez-Zor]]. Hundreds more have been wounded. The crackdown has been the most intense of the [[2011 Syrian uprising]] so far, with already over 2200 protesters deaths since March 15.<ref>[http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/43295395/ns/world_news-mideast_n_africa/t/syria-says-forces-killed-northern-massacre/ Syria says 120 forces killed in 'massacre' - World news - Mideast/N. Africa - msnbc.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.dawn.com/2011/07/31/syrian-army-kills-at-least-95-in-hama-activist.html Syrian army kills at least 95 in Hama: activist | World | DAWN.COM<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> 29 years ago, another [[Hama massacre|major massacre]] took place in Hama where it claimed the lives of nearly 30 thousand during the rule of [[Hafez Assad]].
